pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ethiopian Date Converter========================Introduction------------ethiopian_date is a date converter from Ethiopian calendar to Gregoriancalendar and vice-versa.It is a port from Java's Ealet 2.0.Installation------------ pip install ethiopian_dateResources--------- * http://www.funaba.org/en/calendar-conversion.cgi * http://www.senamirmir.org/projects/
